Oasis Singles

Some Might Say (1995)

Single Statistics

  • Release Date: April 24, 1995
  • UK Chart Position: #1
  • Weeks on Chart: 15
  • Sales: Over 300,000 copies (UK)
  • Parent Album: (What's the Story) Morning Glory?

B-Sides

  • Talk Tonight
  • Acquiesce
  • Headshrinker

Historical Significance

Their first UK number one single and the last to feature original drummer Tony McCarroll.

Roll with It (1995)

Single Statistics

  • Release Date: August 14, 1995
  • UK Chart Position: #2
  • Weeks on Chart: 13
  • Sales: Over 505,000 copies (UK)
  • Parent Album: (What's the Story) Morning Glory?

B-Sides

  • Rockin' Chair
  • Live Forever (Live at Glastonbury '95)
  • Step Out

The Battle of Britpop

Famous for its chart battle with Blur's "Country House" in what became known as "The Battle of Britpop".
